track.name: Dirt In The Ground
comments: I would love to share a shot of whiskey and a smoke with Tom Waits. Such a brilliant man. (2)

my favorite tom waits song. perfect melody, voice and lyrics.
tip: Everlast - I get by , 
dirt in the ground sample
oh man, those vocals are dripping with sadness and emotion.
What a sound! I'd like to share some cough drops with Tom. ;-) But he's great and can be listened in any mood.
The chord progression in the intro played on the piano is just beautiful.
I would love to share a shot of whiskey and a smoke with Tom Waits. Such a brilliant man.
makes me tear up a bit, but in a good way. [2]
The Glitter and Doom live version is absolutely magical.
Tom Waits = Automatic Track Love. [2] Such a marvelous song... soft and melancholic... bitter and sweet... very sweet!
